node.title: Late Night Celebrates the QAnon Shaman’s 41-Month Prison Sentence
node.alt: Late-night hosts threw jabs at Jacob Chansley, aka the QAnon Shaman, for his role in the Jan. 6 Capitol riot.
node.description: “That’s nearly three and a half years, so with good behavior, he could be out in time to storm the Capitol in 2024,” Stephen Colbert joked on Wednesday.
node.content: ["Welcome to Best of Late Night, a rundown of the previous night\u2019s highlights that lets you sleep \u2014 and lets us get paid to watch comedy. Here are the 50 best movies on Netflix right now.", "Jacob Chansley, better known as the QAnon Shaman, was sentenced to 41 months for his role in the Jan. 6 attack on the Capitol.", "\u201cThat\u2019s nearly three and a half years, so with good behavior, he could be out in time to storm the Capitol in 2024,\u201d Stephen Colbert joked on Wednesday night.", "Dulc\u00e9 Sloan looked into the history of historically Black college and university marching bands on Wednesday\u2019s \u201cThe Daily Show.\u201d", "Halle Berry will appear on Thursday\u2019s \u201cDaily Show\u201d to promote her new film, \u201cBruised.\u201d", "Adele\u2019s first new album in six years faces a changing music industry, but she\u2019s always been an exception to the rule."]
